pos_mean_info_list.mean: 圣歌（尤指美国南部黑人的）
沮丧的；沉闷的；无生气的

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指超越身体之外，永远存在的无形的东西，即所谓灵魂，亦可作人解。
当指与body相对而言的所谓灵魂时，可与soul互换使用，但强调人的精神素质，也指神仙、精灵等。
普通用词，主要指死者的灵魂。

word_group.brief_definition: 兴高采烈地；兴致勃勃地
团队精神；合作精神；团结精神
白色溶剂油, 石油溶剂油
独立的人；放浪不羁的人
全身心地投入活动（尤指节庆活动）中
心灵愿意；肉体软弱；心有余而力不足
word_group.phrase: the spirit is willing but the flesh is weak

word_group.brief_definition: 敦刻尔克精神，困难险境中不屈服不放弃的精神

bilingual.source: The Spirit of St Louis is famous.
bilingual.target: 圣路易斯精神号很有名。

bilingual.source: And that is the true spirit of Christmas!
bilingual.target: 这才是圣诞节的真正精神！

bilingual.source: Franklin's spirit of scientific exploration is still considered an inspiration.
bilingual.target: 富兰克林的科学探索精神仍然被认为是灵感来源。

bilingual.source: The spirit of the Aswan Dam project is still alive today.
bilingual.target: 阿斯旺大坝项目的精神今天仍然存在。

bilingual.source: We can all share the true spirit of giving at Christmas time.
bilingual.target: 我们都可以在圣诞节分享真正的给予精神。

bilingual.source: The spirit of sharing joy, gratitude, love, or peace is common in all festivals.
bilingual.target: 分享快乐、感恩、爱或和平的精神在所有节日中都很常见。

bilingual.source: People have been more inspired by Franklin's spirit of scientific exploration than by the facts themselves.
bilingual.target: 人们更多地被富兰克林的科学探索精神所激励，而不是事实本身。

bilingual.source: People have been more encouraged by Franklin's spirit of scientific exploration than by the actual facts.
bilingual.target: 人们更多地被富兰克林的科学探索精神所鼓舞，而不是实际的事实。

bilingual.source: Its artist, Han Gan, is known for his skill in capturing not only the physical features of the animal, but also its inner spirit and strength.
bilingual.target: 其画家韩干以捕捉动物的外貌特征以及内在精神和力量的技巧而闻名。

list.abstract: n.精神，心灵；潮流，风气；（文件等）精神；元气、志气；精灵，圣灵；vt.鼓舞；使振作；神秘地带走；使莫名其妙地出现复数：spirits；
Spiri是俄罗斯的一支电子竞技职业战队。 2021年10月18日，Spirit成为了TI10国际邀请赛的冠军，豪揽1820万美元，成为本届TI的最大赢家。2022年2月1日，Team Spirit战队在官网公布，进军英雄联盟领域，并收购了LCL联赛战队。2023年10月30日，Spirit以3-0战胜GG夺得TI12总冠军。 2024年11月3日，获2024年blast世界总决赛亚军。

yingyinNormal.en: Testing the limits of the human spirit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 测试人的精神极限。

yingyinNormal.en: That's the spirit, Howard. Yes, we can.
yingyinNormal.zh: 霍华德，精神可嘉，我们能行。

yingyinNormal.en: And that? It tried to break the glass. I like her spirit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是什么？它曾试图弄碎玻璃。我喜欢她的精神。

yingyinNormal.en: That's exactly the kind of spirit with which princess Panchali led the monkeys to freedom.
yingyinNormal.zh: 潘查理公主就是凭这种精神，带领猴子走向自由。

yingyinNormal.en: Aw, turkey. Aw, giving thanks. Aw. Look everyone, it's the spirit of Thanksgiving.
yingyinNormal.zh: 啊，火鸡，啊，说谢谢，啊。看，这就是感恩节的精神。

yingyinNormal.en: Fine. You can have them back. I have $17 in my pocket and my boundless spirit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好。你们可以拿回去。我钱包里还有十七块钱以及无限的精神。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, that, right there, that equivocation and self-doubt, that is not the American spirit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 就是这种支吾的语气和自我怀疑，这可不是美国精神。

yingyinNormal.en: America was built on the spirit of industry. You build your future. It isn't handed to you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 美国的根基是勤劳精神，未来靠自己努力，而非靠人施予。

yingyinNormal.en: I am proud to share with you these stories that show the heart and spirit of Alibaba.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我深感荣幸，能和你们分享这些故事，能为您展示阿里巴巴的精神与核心。

yingyinNormal.en: There you go, that's the spirit. Okay. Now, if you need money, I will lend you money, but just get moving.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这就对了！这才是精神所在，你需要钱我借你，你就接吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, honey. This is the move you wanna play now? You're about to find out that your spirit has bounds.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好的。亲爱的。你真想这么做是吗？你会发现你的精神是有限的。

yingyinNormal.en: There you go. That's the spirit I'm looking for! What can we do? All right, who's first? Huh? Ross?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这就对了，我就是要这种精神，“我们能怎么办？”好，谁先来？罗斯？

yingyinNormal.en: And that's the spirit all of us can draw upon as Americans, as we meet this challenge together.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这正是我们所有人作为美国人在我们一起团结应对这一挑战时可以依靠的精神。

yingyinNormal.en: That spirit, that determination to carry on is part of what makes New York one of the great cities in the world.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这种精神，继续下去的决心，这正是让纽约成为世界上最伟大的城市之一的部分原因。

yingyinNormal.en: It's whole tradition of which students get to see the game and which ones don't. And it's about the stamina and desire and true, blue, spirit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哪些学生能去看篮球赛，哪些看不成从来都是一场耐力，热情及忠实的杜克篮球精神的比拼。

yingyinNormal.en: Hi. I'm sorry. Spirit sent us. We got canceled and they said that we were re-routed. That you guys had some seats? Flight is closed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 嗨，抱歉，是精神航空让我们过来的，我们的航班取消了，他们说这可以转机，你们这还有空位吗？停止售票了。

yingyinNormal.en: What are they targeting? Spirit of Detroit, Ambassador Bridge, Livingstone Lighthouse, Belle Isle Fountain, Wayne County Building. All historic landmarks on Belle Isle and downtown.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们的目标是哪里？"底特律精神"雕塑，大使桥利文斯灯塔，贝尔岛喷泉，韦恩县大厦，都是百丽岛和市区的历史地标。

yingyinNormal.en: From giving friendship and support to our veterans, the elderly or the bereaved; to championing music and dance; providing animal welfare; or protecting our fields and forests, their selfless devotion and generosity of spirit is an example to us all.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们陪伴并支持老兵，还有老兵遗孀和家人;他们支持音乐和舞蹈事业，关爱动物，保护我们的土地和森林… 他们的无私奉献和慷慨精神都是我们所有人的榜样。

yingyinNormal.en: No roots. You have spirit, Latin.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没有根基，你有灵魂，拉丁人。

yingyinNormal.en: I go on that site. Restless little spirit, huh?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我上过那个网站。不安分的小心灵，哈？

exam_freq_info.chinese: 精神实质; 核心精神
精神; 灵魂; 心灵
勇气; 意志; 活力

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 精神上的；心灵的；精神的；宗教的；宗教信仰的；高尚的；不为物欲所动的
adj. 生气勃勃的；精力充沛的；热情洋溢的；意志坚定的；有某种特定性格的

word_family.mean: n. 精神；心灵；心；心智；精神实质；气质；特质；核心精神；烈性酒

sense_info_list.en: the typical or most important quality or mood of something
sense_info_list.zh: 精神实质; 核心精神

examination_example.sentence: When public opinion is particularly polarised, monarchs can rise above "mere" politics and "embody" a <highlight>spirit</highlight> of national unity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当公众舆论两极分化的时候，君主能够超越“纯粹”的政治并且“代表”国家统一精神。

examination_example.sentence: While it probably wasn't apparent at the time, much of this work is permeated by a <highlight>spirit</highlight> of romantic escapism.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然这在当时可能并不明显，但这部作品的大部分都洋溢着浪漫的逃避主义精神。

examination_example.sentence: Sadly, the <highlight>spirit</highlight> of inquiry once at home on campus has been replaced by the use of the humanities and social sciences.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 令人伤心的是，校园里曾经红极一时的求索精神已经被人文和社会科学替代了。

sense_info_list.en: the part of a person that includes their mind, feelings and character rather than their body
sense_info_list.zh: 精神; 灵魂; 心灵

examination_example.sentence: When we are deprived of green, of plants, of trees, most of us give in to a demoralization of <highlight>spirit</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我们被剥夺了绿色，植物和树木，我们大多数人会深陷于精神萎靡的状态。

sense_info_list.en: courage, determination or energy
sense_info_list.zh: 勇气; 意志; 活力

examination_example.sentence: Yet even so the compositions often seem to represent attempts to call forth the <highlight>spirit</highlight> of plant and animal life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但即便如此，这些（花园）构造也似乎往往体现了试图唤起动植物生命力的种种努力。

sense_info_list.en: a person's feelings or state of mind
an alcoholic liquor
a person of the type mentioned
take someone or something away in a quick, secret or mysterious way
loyal feelings towards a group, team or society

exam_freq_info.chinese: 灵魂; 鬼魂; 仙子; 小精灵

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 精神上的；心灵的；精神的；宗教的；宗教信仰的；高尚的；不为物欲所动的

word_family.mean: n. 精神；心灵；心；心智；精神实质；气质；特质；核心精神；烈性酒

sense_info_list.en: the part of a person that includes their mind, feelings and character rather than their body

examination_example.sentence: Methods such as whole school fund raising, with the proceeds (收益) pooled, can help to extend opportunities and fuel community <highlight>spirit</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如全校筹集资金并集中收益的方法，可以帮助扩大机会并激发社会精神。

sense_info_list.en: real meaning or intention

examination_example.sentence: At other times, they may disagree with the <highlight>spirit</highlight> of the procedure—the effort demanded, the time consumed, the lack of potential effectiveness.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在其他时候，他们可能不同意程序的精神——所需的努力、所消耗的时间、缺乏潜在的有效性。

examination_example.sentence: It's actually a kind of support because it's offered in the <highlight>spirit</highlight> of helping us improve.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那实际上是一种支持，因为它是以帮助我们进步的精神提供的。

sense_info_list.en: a person's mood

sense_info_list.zh: 灵魂; 鬼魂; 仙子; 小精灵

sense_info_list.en: the attitude or intentions with which someone undertakes or regards something

sample.mean: n. 竞争；角逐；比赛；竞赛；参与竞赛；比赛对手；竞争对手；角逐者
n. 成分的性质；组成方式；结构；作品；排版；排字；和解协议；和解偿还；组成
adj. 含蓄的；不言明的；无条件的；无疑的；绝对的；隐式的；隐的；固有的；内含的；本质相关的
n. 喝彩；赞美；称赞
n. 顶峰；最高点；政府首脑会议；最高级会议；峰会；极点

word_usage.usage: 当 spirit 作“情绪”或“心情”解时，应用其复数形式 spirits。 如： in great spirits 表示“情绪高涨，兴高采烈”
当 spirit 作“气魄，气概，勇气，志气”解时，是不可数名词，要用单数形式。

direction_info.description:

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 精神上的；心灵的；精神的；宗教的；宗教信仰的；高尚的；不为物欲所动的

word_family.mean: n. 精神；心灵；心；心智；精神实质；气质；特质；核心精神；烈性酒

sense_info_list.en: real meaning or intention

examination_example.sentence: It discourages team <highlight>spirit</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它阻碍了团队精神。

sense_info_list.en: a person's mood

examination_example.sentence: So it is more likely that poor health, not just family involvement, dampens <highlight>spirits</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，更可能的情况是，健康状况不佳，而不仅仅是家庭参与，会影响情绪。

examination_example.sentence: Some research has found that people who are most involved with their families have the lowest <highlight>spirits</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些研究发现，与家人关系最密切的人，情绪最低落。

sense_info_list.en: the part of a person that includes their mind; feelings and character rather than their body

examination_example.sentence: Cultivate the <highlight>spirit</highlight> of independence.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 培养独立精神。

sense_info_list.zh: 灵魂; 鬼魂; 仙子; 小精灵

sense_info_list.en: the attitude or intentions with which someone undertakes or regards something

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 精神上的；心灵的；精神的；宗教的；宗教信仰的；高尚的；不为物欲所动的

word_family.mean: n. 精神；心灵；心；心智；精神实质；气质；特质；核心精神；烈性酒

sense_info_list.en: the attitude or intentions with which someone undertakes or regards something

examination_example.sentence: Mastering one thing to the exclusion (排除) of others can hold back your true <highlight>spirit</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 精通一件事而把其他排除在外，这可以抑制你的心境。

examination_example.sentence: Authentic fire gear is provided for your warmth as you get into the holiday <highlight>spirit</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当您沉浸在节日的气氛时，真正的消防装备为您提供温暖。

sense_info_list.en: a person's mood

examination_example.sentence: They arrive at the class in low <highlight>spirits</highlight> and they leave with a smile.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们无精打采地来到教室，却微笑着离开。

examination_example.sentence: A nervous night to be sure, but sometimes the <highlight>spirits</highlight> of nature smile on us all!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当然，这是一个紧张的夜晚，但有时大自然的精灵会对我们所有人微笑！

examination_example.sentence: And it is our creative <highlight>spirit</highlight>, our visionary sense of freshness, that has been our strength for centuries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 正是我们的创造精神、和对于新鲜事物的远见卓识，成为了我们走过几个世纪的力量支撑。

sample.mean: n. 竞争；角逐；比赛；竞赛；参与竞赛；比赛对手；竞争对手；角逐者
n. 成分的性质；组成方式；结构；作品；排版；排字；和解协议；和解偿还；组成

n. 喝彩；赞美；称赞

exam_freq_info.chinese: 勇气; 意志; 活力

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 精神上的；心灵的；精神的；宗教的；宗教信仰的；高尚的；不为物欲所动的
adj. 生气勃勃的；精力充沛的；热情洋溢的；意志坚定的；有某种特定性格的

word_family.mean: n. 精神；心灵；心；心智；精神实质；气质；特质；核心精神；烈性酒

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 兴高采烈地；兴致勃勃地
团队精神；合作精神；团结精神

sense_info_list.en: the part of a person that includes their mind, feelings and character rather than their body

examination_example.sentence: What <highlight>spirit</highlight> of the team encourages all Chinese?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个团队的什么精神鼓励着所有中国人？

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>spirit</highlight> of these climbers shows us that we should never give up trying to achieve our dreams.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些登山者的精神向我们我们展现出：我们要永不言弃、努力实现自己的梦想。

examination_example.sentence: Shanghai <highlight>Spirit</highlight> is the shared treasure, which suggests mutual-trust, mutual-benefit and equality among all member countries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 上海精神是共同的财富，它倡导所有成员国之间的互信、互利和平等。

sense_info_list.en: a person's mood

examination_example.sentence: Being in high <highlight>spirits</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 情绪高涨。

examination_example.sentence: I sent them a letter to state that I gave up, and in bitterness of <highlight>spirit</highlight> I signed it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我给他们寄了一封信，表明我放弃了，我怀着痛苦的心情在信上签了字。

examination_example.sentence: People who always do sports are in higher <highlight>spirits</highlight> than those who don't.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 总是做运动的人比不做运动的人情绪更高昂。

sense_info_list.en: courage, determination or energy
sense_info_list.zh: 勇气; 意志; 活力

examination_example.sentence: Sometimes laughing at yourself will make you be more attractive, but you need to have enough <highlight>spirit</highlight> to do so.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有时候自嘲会让自己更有魅力，但是你需要有足够的意志去这样做。

examination_example.sentence: Two robot explores (探测器), or 'rovers', called <highlight>Spirit</highlight> and Opportunity were sent to look for signs of water.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 两个探测器，或者说“火星车”，叫做“勇气号”和“机遇号”，被派去探寻水的迹象。

sense_info_list.en: the attitude or intentions with which someone undertakes or regards something

examination_example.sentence: To have a <highlight>spirit</highlight> of doing by yourself is more useful than crying for help.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 拥有自力更生的态度，比哭喊求救更有用。

sense_info_list.en: real meaning or intention

examination_example.sentence: Which saying can express the <highlight>spirit</highlight> of the passage?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 哪一句话能表达文章的意义？

word_usage.usage: 当 spirit 作“情绪”或“心情”解时，应用其复数形式 spirits。 如： in great spirits 表示“情绪高涨，兴高采烈”
当 spirit 作“气魄，气概，勇气，志气”解时，是不可数名词，要用单数形式。
